title: Wandering Eye Fish
summaries: The Wandering Eye Fish is an enemy that can be spawned by fishing in a Blood Moon. When the bobber dips and the player attempts to reel in a fish, a Wandering Eye Fish or a Zombie Merman has a chance to spawn within a few blocks of the bobber in place of the fish. In Hardmode, a Hemogoblin Shark or Blood Eel has a chance to spawn within a few blocks of the bobber in place of the Wandering Eye Fish.

It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. The Wandering Eye Fish requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of its <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.

statistics.Damage: 35/70/105
statistics.Max Life: 300/600/900
statistics.Banner: [img:Wandering Eye Fish Banner]Wandering Eye Fish Banner(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
